oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Glimpses of Nashville, Tennessee: Cherry Street from Church Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A street view of Cherry Street (Fourth Avenue N) from Church Street, in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1904. The St. Bernard Coal Company is pictured in the foreground. Forms part of Glimpses of Nashville. 1 booklet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: St. Bernard Coal Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
